paragraphs: Hi, I'm Amy. A little about me: I consider my self a jack-of-all trades designer. I love all aspects of design and trying to pick just one field would feel to me like trying to pick a favorite child. I enjoy branding, motion graphics, UI/UXâ€¦all of it! I hope you'll see from my portfolio that I am skilled in all of these areas and more.

pages.title: UVU State of the University 2022
paragraphs: I art directed the event branding and design for the 2022 UVU State of the University address by developing the look-and-feel and directing fellow team-members in creating assets for the event. I created many of the assets myself, including the motion graphics for the event, and delegated other assets to others on my team. the look-and-feel for the event was inspired by and incorporates elements from the 80th anniversary campaign launched at the start of the previous semester.
Photography for this event was done by the UVU photo team.

pages.title: House of Demeter Branding
paragraphs: House of Demeter is a hypothetical Greek and barbecue fusion restaurant. For this project, I designed a logo and expanded brand elements, including a menu, gift card, and envelope shown here.

pages.title: Blue Synergy Brand Guide
paragraphs: Blue Synergy is a software development company. I was hired as a contracted designer to create a brand identity and light brand guide.

pages.title: Tom Proctor
paragraphs: I was hired as a contracted photographer and designer for Tom Proctor Band. Tom is a country singer/song-writer and actor. I did a promotional photoshoot for him and expanded his personal brand through the design of his EPK (Electronic Press Kit). I used his existing Tom Proctor logo as inspiration for the design.
